status_message.description: Optional operator-approved message safe for direct UI display. Must not include internal diagnostics, stack traces, or secret identifiers.

degraded_reason_code.description: Optional frontend-safe reason code for degraded/offline states.

data_freshness_seconds.description: Optional staleness indicator for currently displayed status data.

next_retry_at.description: Optional ISO-8601 timestamp indicating when the frontend should try refreshing status again.
